mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TITLE FROM T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_SEQ = #{scheduleSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE ( MEMBER_SEQ, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TITLE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{memberSeq}, #{scheduleType}, #{scheduleDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{title}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MEMBER_SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_TYPE = #{scheduleType}, SCHEDULE_DATE = #{scheduleDate}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, TITLE = #{title} WHERE SCHEDULE_SEQ = #{scheduleSeq}
